name: BLOODSUCKED (2022)
description:
***AVAILABLE ON SIDEQUEST NOW!***

Killer bats surround you as your vampirical lifeforce quickly drains away. The only way to survive is through. It's one-on-tons. It's kill or be killed. This is your last stand.

BLOODSUCKED (2022 EDITION) INCLUDES:

An all new map that looks way better (and won't blind you)!

3D Bat Monsters with hair all over (and now you can hear them too)!

And an epic, rock-heavy soundtrack by the developer (coming to streaming platforms soon)!

CREDITS

Everything by me, except for some Unity Assets and additional sound effects by zapsplat.org
